channel.title: Team on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi
channel.description: Recent content in Team on HydroSense Lab, IIT Delhi

item.title: Manabendra Saharia
item.description: Dr. Manabendra Saharia is currently an Assistant Professor in the Department of Civil Engineering at the Indian Institute of Technology Delhi. Previously, he worked in the hydrology labs of NASA Goddard Space Flight Center and National Center for Atmospheric Research. Since 2020, he has started setting up the HydroSense Lab at IITD, primarily dedicated to the modeling and mitigation of water-related hazards. Recruitment is on at all levels. Please check this.

item.title: Avish Jain
item.description: Data analysis, deep learning, social media analytics
